LanguageData.SnakeVenom.label: snake venom
LanguageData.SnakeVenom.description: Venom from a snake. Tribals have been known to use its toxic properties for lethal and nonlethal applications.
LanguageData.Antivenom.label: antivenom
LanguageData.Antivenom.description: Capable of relieving the severity of various forms of toxic buildup. Modern medical technology has led to the development of this potent antivenom.
